attributes.action: Null and void the EFL Championship season 2020/2021.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the parliament to discuss further the idea of abandoning the footballing season until the next commences. It simply is not safe enough during these critical times to keep putting lives on the line.
attributes.background: Health has to be the priority, we as a country need to focus on looking after each other and saving lives and therefore cancelling the EFL Championship season is a start for us as a nation heading in the right direction. Stay at home, protect the NHS, save lives.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ban elite sports being played during lockdown 3
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566813
